original_text: So be very careful that you do not turn away from the Lord our God to worship the gods of those nations. No man, woman, clan or tribe among you must ever want to do that. That would be like the root of a plant that gives fruits which are full of poison.
korean_text: 너희 중에 남자나 여자나 가족이나 지파나 오늘 그 마음이 우리 하나님 여호와를 떠나서 그 모든 민족의 신들에게 가서 섬길까 염려하며 독초와 쑥의 뿌리가 너희 중에 생겨서

sentences.original_text: that you do not turn away from the Lord our God
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 우리 주 하나님께서 떠나지 않도록

sentences.original_text: to worship the gods of those nations
No man, woman, clan or tribe among you
sentences.korean_translation: 당신들 중 어떤 남자, 여자, 씨족이나 지파도

sentences.original_text: must ever want to do that
sentences.korean_translation: 결코 그렇게 하고 싶어해서는 안 됩니다

sentences.original_text: That would be like the root of a plant
that gives fruits which are full of poison
